    • Constructor Detail

      • BPMathModelNode

        public BPMathModelNode(int dataCount,
               AttributedModelNode modelNode)
        Constructor of the ModelNode type that sets: 1) Unique ID 2) Optional field that indicates node or relation type. The type often constrains the list of attributes for a node or relation. 3) TODO: What are "successor" relations? 4) TODO: What are "predecessor" relations?
        Parameters:
        dataCount - Number of nodes in the Data Graph
        modelNode - Model node in the graph that will be turned into a BPMathModel node to perform Belief propagation on it

    • Method Detail

      • getMuSorted

        public java.lang.Boolean getMuSorted()
        Method gets a boolean variable that says if the messages should be sorted
        Returns:
        Boolean variable that sorts the messages if True

      • setMuSorted

        public void setMuSorted(java.lang.Boolean sorted)
        Method sets a boolean parameter that if true will sort the messages
        Parameters:
        sorted - Boolean argument to have the messages sorted

      • setMu

        public void setMu(java.util.ArrayList<DataNodeAndMu> mu)
        Sets the messages, which are mismatch comparisons, between model and all data nodes
        Parameters:
        mu - Array list of a message for each data node

      • getMu

        public java.util.ArrayList<DataNodeAndMu> getMu()
        Gets a list of messages, which are mismatch comparisons, between a model and each data node
        Returns:
        ArrayList of a message, which is the mismatch comparisons, between the model and all data nodes

      • initMu

        public void initMu(int dataCount)
        Initilize the list of messages for each data node
        Parameters:
        dataCount - Integer number of data nodes within the Data Graph. Note that initial messages will be set to 1.0 for each data node.

      • muToString

        public java.lang.String muToString()
        Print the list of messages, which is the mismatch between a model and data node, for each data node to a String
        Returns:
        String that contains a pair of (DataNodeIndex,Message)
